channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside 57 Mapesbury Road, 20th February
item.description:
Massive pothole. Has been fixed but obviously not done properly. Please send immediate help. My tires have popped because of this pothole.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London

item.title: Dead fox in bin bag, 20th February
item.description:

item.title: Sinking slab, 20th February

item.title: Dead trees on Penpoll road x Wilton way garden, 20th February
item.description:
The trees in this garden have been dead for over a year. Can we please have them replaced, I see lots of other streets get new trees planted and we pay rates towards this and would love to see this wonderful community spaces maintained to the same standard

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Penpoll Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bags ripped open, 20th February
item.description:
The bags have been dumped at Buckler Gardens and now the foxes have ripped open gags and rubbish and food is all over the street. Elderly people and pushchairs cannot pass due to the amount of filth on the pathway. This looks unsightly
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Longcroft, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain flowing into pedestrian path from 629 green lanes n8, 20th February
item.description:
It is smelling human excrement looks as if it is blocked toilet drain flowing into pedestrian path the last three days. It continues to flow. It is dangerous for public health.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 637, Green Lanes, Harringay, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering my train tracks, 20th February
item.description:
Litter accumulating on garden side of train tracks, lots of plastics etc. Bad for the environment and an eyesore. Not sure if this is council responsibility or if you can contact the rail company and request them to tidy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Penpoll Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Re ref no 8958055, “2nd light from top of StMary’s Avenue”, it is in fact the first light on thar side of the road, outside number 1, not the 2nd. Apologies!, 20th February
item.description:
See above. First light in st mary’s avenue, same side as church hall, outside number obe st. Mary’s Avenue, has not been working for many months. Pavement is uneven and very dark and dangerous for the elderly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Hill Road, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Street light outside 12 Palace Road still not fixed, 20th February
item.description:
Street light outside 12 Palace Road still has problems (Asset ID: P-34-3) still has problems. I have seen the light on again this week but when I came home yesterday evening between 21:30 + 22:00 the light was not on. Please recheck. It has been previously reported but claims to be fixed - it is not but perhaps the timing is wrong?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Palace Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
